entry.title: About Me
entry.summary:
Passion, dedicate, easy going, and quick learner

Hey, I am Zhiyuan Jiang, a Master student from Duke university major in Economics.

🏫Academic Background

I received education in both United States and Australia.
My academic interest covered a broad topics including finance, economics, and statistics.

💼Professional Experience

My main professional experiences are focusing investment, which provides me a unique business prospects most data analysts and data scientists does not have.
This will help me to provide better insights and suggestions to the companies marketing, operations and other teams.

🛠 Skills
